snippet: SANTORO--Lawrence. August 15, 1944 to March 16, 2016. Loving husband to Naomi, an endless optimist, dedicated professor, mathematician and magician who could spin words and stir tomato sauce into expressions of pure love. Dad, we are keeping the music on and the volume turned up. Gabriella and Daniella 1/3
